comments.body:
Why the repetition in the `if` and `else` clauses? This is bound to get out of sync at some point...

As far as I can tell, if you call `flags.StringVarP` and pass it a "" as short option it will simply keep no short option for it, so why not just always call it with `flagNames.AuthPathShort` considering it's already "" in the case you don't want a short flag for it?

> This is bound to get out of sync at some point

If it's still in there tomorrow, I'll update to use a common variable.

> call flags.StringVarP and pass it a "" as short option it will simply keep no short option for it

I don't see that in the docs, though I agree that the code actually does that.  It feels like that's coincidence, not API.  I don't know that I'd feel comfortable doing that.
